      • getSecretFingerprint

        public java.lang.String getSecretFingerprint(android.content.Context context)
        Method to generate the secret fingerprint. This method should be replaced by a secure one.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        Returns:
        The fingerprint string, which contains the first, 15. and 31. Byte of the secret in hex representation.
